body:
Comment 1 by **santiago.gala**: 
Ok, a bit of network snooping and stracing showed what is going on:

- in spite of printing the "leaving ..." message, tests (8.out) are still running inside
the net directory. This was actually misleading me.
- the 8.out process is trying to do the "dialgoogle_test.go
- www.google.com is no longer, at least from where I stand in the network, at
74.125.19.99 (reverse nuq04s01-in-f99.1e100.net.) . It shows as 66.249.92.104 (reverse
par03s01-in-f104.1e100.net) here...
- The old address is taking forever to fail (more than 5 minutes with no failure printed)
- When I run it with gotest -ipv6 it shows that ipv6.google.com address has also changed
to 2a00:1450:8006::93 (again here)

The following trivial change, just switching both ipv4 and ipv6 addresses, makes the
test pass, and thus the whole build:

$ hg diff
diff -r ca4f9687cec0 src/pkg/net/dialgoogle_test.go
--- a/src/pkg/net/dialgoogle_test.go	Fri Oct 15 12:05:05 2010 +1100
+++ b/src/pkg/net/dialgoogle_test.go	Fri Oct 15 14:21:53 2010 +0200
@@ -40,17 +40,17 @@
 }
 
 var googleaddrs = []string{
-	"74.125.19.99:80",
+	"66.249.92.104:80",
 	"www.google.com:80",
-	"74.125.19.99:http",
+	"66.249.92.104:http",
 	"www.google.com:http",
-	"074.125.019.099:0080",
-	"[::ffff:74.125.19.99]:80",
-	"[::ffff:4a7d:1363]:80",
-	"[0:0:0:0:0000:ffff:74.125.19.99]:80",
-	"[0:0:0:0:000000:ffff:74.125.19.99]:80",
-	"[0:0:0:0:0:ffff::74.125.19.99]:80",
-	"[2001:4860:0:2001::68]:80", // ipv6.google.com; removed if ipv6 flag not set
+	"066.249.092.104:0080",
+	"[::ffff:66.249.92.104]:80",
+	"[::ffff:42f9:5c68]:80",
+	"[0:0:0:0:0000:ffff:66.249.92.104]:80",
+	"[0:0:0:0:000000:ffff:66.249.92.104]:80",
+	"[0:0:0:0:0:ffff::66.249.92.104]:80",
+	"[2a00:1450:8006::93]:80", // ipv6.google.com; removed if ipv6 flag not set
 }
 
 func TestDialGoogle(t *testing.T) {
diff -r ca4f9687cec0 src/pkg/net/timeout_test.go
--- a/src/pkg/net/timeout_test.go	Fri Oct 15 12:05:05 2010 +1100
+++ b/src/pkg/net/timeout_test.go	Fri Oct 15 14:21:53 2010 +0200
@@ -51,8 +51,8 @@
 }
 
 func TestTimeoutTCP(t *testing.T) {
-	// 74.125.19.99 is www.google.com.
+	// 66.249.92.104 is www.google.com.
 	// could use dns, but dns depends on
 	// timeouts and this is the timeout test.
-	testTimeout(t, "tcp", "74.125.19.99:80", false)
+	testTimeout(t, "tcp", "66.249.92.104:80", false)
 }
